Key Match Events: Zach Edey fouled out after 15 minutes in his NBA debut; Grizzlies withstood a late Utah charge to win the season-opening road game
Post-Match Reflections: Ja Morant said he was excited to be back on the court and mentioned his teammates' trust in him; Zach Edey's debut was noted as a different level but still basketball
Miscellaneous Highlights: Zach Edey's impressive preseason performance included a 23-point, nine-rebound game; Memphis Grizzlies won despite Edey's early exit
